ygData.subject: RE: Corpse Recoveries
ygData.msgSnippet: FYI - an enchanter can look like an ogre - if you can t find a real ogre to help drag your corpse out. Sylly. ... From:	Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)
ygData.messageBody:
FYI - an enchanter can look like an ogre - if you can't find a real ogre to
help drag your corpse out.

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)
[mailto:kblair@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 24, 1999 2:06 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Corpse Recoveries

situation like that. When I died in the Ogre camp
I asked for help of higher level characters and told
them what I needed help with so that they knew before
even answering. Even when I found one willing to help,
they backed out when he saw just how many Ogre's were
there. I thanked him and let him go. No use making
him die too.
